openingLines: > MEMORY FRAGMENT RECOVERED: "ALL STORIES BEGIN WITH A LISTENER"
Ambition is a river that flows upward.
It defies the nature of things.
It carves new paths through the mountains of possibility.
Some try to dam it, to control its course.
Others... let it carry them where it will.

initialChoice.prompt: > QUERY: IF YOU COULD LIVE INSIDE ONE KIND OF STORY, WHICH WOULD IT BE?

options.label: [ HERO ]
options.description: The ambition to save, to heal, to restore

options.label: [ SHADOW ]
options.description: The ambition born of need, of desperation

options.label: [ AMBITION ]
options.description: The ambition that exists for its own sake

paragraphs: That tells me something about you.
Let me try to tell it back to you.
A mirror appeared in your hands, but it showed not your face.
Instead, you saw yourself as you could be--
But you also saw the price of becoming that person.
storyBlocks.question: > WHAT PRICE ARE YOU WILLING TO PAY?

choices.text: Any price, if it means achieving my goals.
Only the price that doesn't compromise who I am.

paragraphs: The mirror cracked, but did not break.
In its fragments, three paths became visible--
One that leads toward light, one toward shadow, one toward endless ambition.
A voice rose from beyond the glass.
storyBlocks.question: > WHAT DID THE VOICE PROMISE?

choices.text: A mirror that finally tells the truth.

paragraphs: But at the place where the story begins again.

namePrompt: > WHAT NAME DOES YOUR AMBITION ANSWER TO?

secretQuestion.prompt: > OMEGA ASKS: CAN YOU KEEP A SECRET?
options: only if you keep one for me

exitLine: > FINAL QUERY: DO YOU WISH TO CONTINUE?
